mapper.select: select r.review_no as reviewNo, r.order_no as orderNo, r.product_no as productNo, p.product_name as productName, r.user_id as userId, r.review_content as reviewContent, r.review_regdate as reviewRegdate from reviews r, products p where r.product_no = p.product_no and r.product_no = #{productNo} order by r.review_regdate desc
mapper.delete: delete from reviews where review_no = #{reviewNo} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reviews r, products p where r.product_no = p.product_no and r.product_no = #{productNo}
